stadium.name: The High-Pass Pitch
stadium.description: A field built at a breathtaking altitude in a fortified mountain pass. The air is painfully thin, and the weather is dangerously unpredictable.

stats.pregame_ritual: Tying a small, hand-carved wooden bird to their gear.
Slapping their own helmet until their ears ring.
Avoiding eye contact with anyone wearing the color green.
Sharing a ceremonial, non-alcoholic grog from a communal cup.
Whispering a secret fear to the Trollball before the game.
Reciting their grocery list backward to clear their mind.
Dipping their hands in a bucket of ice-cold well water.
Asking a teammate to tell them a story, but only the beginning.
Exchanging well-wishes with their direct opponent before the game starts.
Singing a sea shanty completely out of tune.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.

stadium.name: Fletchings Field
stadium.description: Fletchings Field was the first formal Troll Ball stadium in Warden lands. The design balances wood and stone, with arrowhead motifs and banners representing each region under Warden protection. The field includes trees, gully's and other obstacle placements, changed each match by local druids and terrain crafters.

stats.pregame_ritual: Going over the game plan drawn in the dirt with the team captain.
Leading the team in a synchronized chant that slowly gets louder.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Giving the Trollball a heroic backstory before each game.
Headbutting their own team's goal post (gently).
Sticking a specific type of feather in their helmet's plume.
Burying their helmet in the ground and then digging it back up.
Reading their own fortune in a scattering of knuckle bones.
Wearing a specific, garishly colored pair of undergarments.
Always putting on their left gauntlet before their right.

preGame:
## üéôÔ∏è LIVE FROM THE HIGH-PASS PITCH!

**GOOD EVENING, OSTERRA!** This is **Nok the Corrupter**, broadcasting to you live on the magical frequency, and boy do we have a dizzying spectacle for you tonight! We are way up in the clouds at **The High-Pass Pitch**! The air is thin, the wind is howling, and the drop-off is **STEEP**! It‚Äôs the perfect place for a lung-popping, bone-breaking Tuesday Night Trollball extravaganza!

Tonight, the **Oak & Onslaught** have trudged all the way up the mountain to face the home team, **The Oread's Summit Tamers**! Now, the Oak crew is backed by those goody-two-shoes **Wardens**. I bet **Sir Randy** sent them off with a delicately handwritten note and a fresh coat of varnish on their armor. *Disgusting!* I hear **Hole Bowerman** was seen burying her helmet in the frozen dirt earlier‚Äîprobably trying to dig a grave for her team's dignity before the whistle even blows! And keep an eye on **Milt Casady**; he's been leading a chant that sounds less like a war cry and more like a plea for mercy!

Facing them are the mountain masters themselves, the **Summit Tamers**! These folks are cozy with the **Prismatic Troups**, so expect some theatrical violence! **Zadoc Wyatan** was passing around a communal cup of grog in the locker room‚Äîhopefully, it's strong enough to make them forget the freezing cold! And **Odericus Juxon** has been slapping their own helmet until their ears ring! That‚Äôs the kind of brain-rattling enthusiasm I like to see! The altitude is high, the stakes are low, and the violence is GUARANTEED! **PLAY BALL!**
postGame:
## ü©∏ POST-GAME CARNAGE REPORT ü©∏

**MERCY ME, FOLKS! IT WAS A MASSACRE ON THE MOUNTAIN!**

The final score is **The Oread's Summit Tamers: 5**, and **Oak & Onslaught: A BIG FAT ZERO!** A shut-out! A goose egg! An absolute embarrassment for the Wardens! **Falric** is going to need to steal a lot of hearts to pay for the therapy bills after this one!

The action started with a bang‚Äîliterally! **Normi Glaudia** of the Onslaught didn't waste any time, tackling **Dric Trilley** and **INJURING THEM** right out of the gate! That‚Äôs how you start a game! But the Tamers have a healer worth their salt; **Carn Tibbetts** patched Dric up and sent them back into the meat grinder.

The Tamers didn't take that lying down. **Edme Virgil** intercepted a sloppy pass from **Affra Yanaton**, swinging the momentum. Then, **Odericus Juxon**‚Äîmy player of the match‚Äîdecided to get even. Juxon slammed into **Affra Yanaton**, causing a nasty **INJURY**! That's the spirit! An eye for an eye, a bone for a bone!

The Tamers' offense then woke up. **Clippard Burr** launched a beauty of a shot from Home Field to put 2 points on the board! **SCORES!** Moments later, **Kass Fogel** snagged an interception off a terrible throw by **Wynnie Faina** and immediately fired back a shot from Center Field! **ANOTHER 2 POINTS!** At halftime, it was 4-0, and the Oak & Onslaught looked like they needed an oxygen tank and a miracle.

The second half was just pure bullying. **Edme Virgil** laid out **Ema Ulrick** with a crushing tackle, sending another Warden-lover to the infirmary with an **INJURY**! And **Odericus Juxon** wasn't done! They steamrolled **Abner Seidel**, adding another notch to the **INJURY** count! It was beautiful! Bodies hitting the floor like sacks of potatoes!

Finally, to add insult to injury, **Zadoc Wyatan** ran the ball all the way home and **DUNKED IT** for the final point! And just for fun, Zadoc tackled **Millham Evangeline** on a later play, causing‚Äîyou guessed it‚Äîanother **INJURY**! 

The Oak & Onslaught offense was nonexistent. **Millham Evangeline** tried to run, tried to shoot, and just got stopped every time. The **Summit Tamers** used that thin air to their advantage and absolutely suffocated the visitors. **Sir Randy**, stick to archery, because your Trollball team is trash! **NOK OUT!**
